elements.name: intro_how_ai_makes_decisions_post
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning - How AI Makes Decisions (K-5)!

Post-Module Survey

Thanks for learning with us!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

How AI Makes Decisions (K-5) - Post-Module Survey

elements.name: how_ai_makes_decisions_better_understanding
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a better understanding of how AI concepts.

elements.name: how_ai_makes_decisions_comfort_supporting_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I am more comfortable in my ability to support students learning about AI concepts.

elements.name: how_ai_makes_decisions_know_what_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a basic understanding of what my students will learn in Code.org’s How AI Makes Decisions curriculum.

elements.name: how_ai_makes_decisions_comfort_ability_to_teach
elements.title: After completing this module, I feel more comfortable in my ability to teach Code.org’s How AI Makes Decisions curriculum than I did before starting this professional learning course.

elements.name: how_ai_makes_decisions_supported_learning
elements.title: Which of the following supported your learning the most? Rank the options from most helpful (5) to least helpful (1). Please apply each rank (1-5) exactly once; don't give the same ranking to two different items.

rows.text: Reading a page that contained text and images about a topic.
